Have you tried some generic 24-pin drive: I tried generic-text-only, and just about every other driver that I knew was for a thermal printer (like Brother and Zebra which specialize in those)

The user manual for it at http://www.minuszerodegrees.net/oa/OA%20-%20IBM%20PC%20Compact%20Printer.pdf says "thermal non-impact dot-matix" with 8 print elements in the head... I'm not sure about 8pin but we had old generic 9pin and 24pin that used to work with Epson ppd files
